data.name: Rogue Company - Power Ballad Pack
data.detailed_description:
Are you ready to rock n' roll? Sing to your own tune with Dallas' Power Ballad outfit, exclusive to this pack! Equip the Neon Cheetah weapon wrap to any primary, secondary, or melee weapon to stand out from the crowd.

Includes:
- Power Ballad Dallas
- Neon Cheetah Primary Weapon Wrap
- Neon Cheetah Secondary Weapon Wrap
- Neon Cheetah Melee Weapon Wrap
data.about_the_game:
Are you ready to rock n' roll? Sing to your own tune with Dallas' Power Ballad outfit, exclusive to this pack! Equip the Neon Cheetah weapon wrap to any primary, secondary, or melee weapon to stand out from the crowd.

Includes:
- Power Ballad Dallas
- Neon Cheetah Primary Weapon Wrap
- Neon Cheetah Secondary Weapon Wrap
- Neon Cheetah Melee Weapon Wrap
data.short_description: Ready to rock n' roll? Stand out from the crowd with Dallas' Power Ballad outfit and the Neon Cheetah weapon wrap. Includes: - Power Ballad Dallas - Neon Cheetah Primary Weapon Wrap - Neon Cheetah Secondary Weapon Wrap - Neon Cheetah Melee Weapon Wrap
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-2320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.20 ghz 12
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
